_source.short_desc: iAuditor helps businesses update & distribute their best practices with real-time visibility into effectiveness across their sites.
_source.long_desc:
iAuditor is used to conduct over 2 million inspections per month across all industries for safety, quality control, and operations.

It is used by over 25,000 businesses worldwide to complete more than 600M checks per year to improve safety and quality in their workplaces.

All of the inspection data is captured in real-time allowing you to instantly identify missed inspections and failed items and rapidly mitigate risks.
_source.pricing_details:
iAuditor is FREE, simply download the app and login using your iAuditor account from the mobile or web app. iAuditor offers several flexible plan types with added features on a per user, per month basis. 


- Premium: $19/user per month, billed annually, and $24/user per month, billed monthly. Looking to upgrade? Check out all the benefits of premium at safetyculture.com/pricing

- Enterprise: Options available, contact us today for a quote at safetyculture.com/contact-us
_source.target_audience: SafetyCulture iAuditor is designed for companies who need to conduct safety inspections & quality audits, to quickly spot and resolve issues, and to improve operational efficiency across their teams.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
related_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: Create your own custom dashboard with drag-and-drop building blocks that let you see all of your team's work at a glance.
related_products.features: On monday.com's open platform, you can create dashboards within minutes on pre-made templates. Or, add columns, widgets, and apps to fully customize your dashboard for your workflows, no matter how unique they may be. With full visibility, you'll be able to reduce long email threads and meetings while your team gets even more done. The all-in-one platform your team will actually enjoy using, monday.com's dashboards allow you to have both the "best in class" and the "enterprise suite."

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Tableau Software helps people see and understand data. Tableau delivers fast analytics, visualization and business intelligence.
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data. Learn More!

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Sisense delivers rapid, full-scale analytics on large and scattered datasets and allows for easy exploration of complex data.
related_products.features:
Sisense is the only business intelligence software that makes it easy for users to prepare, analyze and visualize complex data. Sisense provides an end-to-end solution for tackling growing data sets from multiple sources, that comes out-of-the-box with the ability to crunch terabytes of data and support thousands of users--all on a single commodity server.

Sisense has already won over the hearts of some of the worlds leading, most data-intensive companies, including eBay, Henry Schein, NASA

related_products.short_desc: ProWorkflow is an industry leading and much loved project, task and workflow management software.
related_products.features: ProWorkflow is an industry-leading comprehensive project management tool for teams of 5 to 5000. 17 years of experience and trusted for over 3 million projects, we understand small details through to big data. Track Gantt chart tasks, Kanban boards, time, documents, communications, quotes and invoices. Our powerful API and customizable features let you easily tailor ProWorkflow. World-class customer support & free on-boarding makes the decision to join easy.

related_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
related_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

related_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data.
related_products.features: An online business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports and dashboards in minutes, with no IT help. Data can be imported from files, web feeds, popular business applications, cloud and on-premises databases, cloud storages etc. Free for 2 users. Pricing starts at $25 per month.

related_products.short_desc: With Domo, you can empower your entire team with data insights in real-time, cloud-based dashboards.
related_products.features: Domo is no ordinary dashboard software. Built on the Domo platform, Domo's dashboards provide data in real-time, so your data is never stale. Create and share custom views of your data on the fly, in minutes, with dashboards that are orders of magnitude easier to use.

With full visibility, you'll be able to reduce long email threads and meetings while your team gets even more done. similar_products.short_desc: Salesforce Datorama provides the leading cloud-based, AI-powered marketing intelligence and analytics platform.
similar_products.features: Salesforce Datorama provides the leading cloud-based, AI-powered marketing intelligence and analytics platform for enterprises, agencies, and publishers. Datorama provides marketing intelligence solutions for all marketers and helps you bring together all of your marketing data into one dashboard view. Create compelling data-driven stories with Datorama dashboards, optimize your marketing campaigns, and make data-driven decisions faster.

similar_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data.
similar_products.features: An online business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports and dashboards in minutes, with no IT help. Data can be imported from files, web feeds, popular business applications, cloud and on-premises databases, cloud storages etc. Free for 2 users. Pricing starts at $25 per month.

similar_products.short_desc: With Domo, you can empower your entire team with data insights in real-time, cloud-based dashboards.
similar_products.features: Domo is no ordinary dashboard software. Built on the Domo platform, Domo's dashboards provide data in real-time, so your data is never stale. Create and share custom views of your data on the fly, in minutes, with dashboards that are orders of magnitude easier to use.

similar_products.short_desc: Yellowfin is the only analytics suite that successfully combines action based dashboards with industry-leading automated analysis.
similar_products.features: Dashboards that not only drive action, but allow you take action without ever leaving Yellowfin. Yellowfin dashboarding allows you to custom code actions right on the dashboard that call on APIs, design anything with a pixel perfect canvas, and query the data with AI with just a click. Bring your users? workflows to the dashboard for seamless data decision making.

similar_products.short_desc: Analytics platform to connect to all your data sources and build and distribute highly customizable dashboards and reports.
similar_products.features:
Klipfolio is a powerful analytics and BI platform used by thousands of businesses to make better decisions. 

Connect to any data source and centralize all of your data in one place. Visualize, explore and distribute the data the way you need it. 

From highly customizable dashboards and reports to self-serve data exploration and client management, Klipfolio serves a broad range of analytics needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
similar_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

similar_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
similar_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

similar_products.short_desc: AnswerRocket uses natural language processing and AI-driven automation to generate in-depth insights and visualizations in seconds.
similar_products.features: AnswerRocket is the AI-powered solution for business analytics. AnswerRocket leverages artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques to automate the hard work of business analysis, empowering teams to generate business intelligence and advanced analytics in seconds via powerful dashboard insights. Whether you need to ask questions in plain English, create interactive visualizations and dashboards, uncover actionable insights, or automate entire workflows, AnswerRocket has you covered.

similar_products.short_desc: Create better Dashboards with automated data collection from 500+ marketing and advertising platforms. Start your free trial today.
similar_products.features: Power your dashboards with cleaned, mapped data from over 500 marketing and advertising platforms. Funnel collects data from all your channels and sends it anywhere you want, a Dashboard Solution, Data Warehouse, BI Tool. Google Sheets, Data Studio, Tableau, Looker, you name it. Stop wasting time unifying data from multiple platforms and let Funnel do the hard work so you can focus on getting the most out of your numbers and figures. Free trial available.

similar_products.short_desc: Informer 5 is a robust, extensible, end-to-end data discovery and analytics platform connecting all your on-prem and cloud data.
similar_products.features: Informer 5 is a robust, embeddable data discovery and analytics platform that simplifies the process of accessing, cleansing, blending, and analyzing data. Explore, visualize and analyze relevant data on the fly. Securely publish Reports and collaborate with colleagues. Generate Dashboards that consolidate critical performance metrics.

similar_products.short_desc: FullStory helps businesses understand, measure, and perfect their digital experience across sites and apps.
similar_products.features: FullStory is a trusted Digital Experience Intelligence (DXI) platform that combines rich product analytics, robust session detail, and collaboration tools to deliver real-time insights that uncover opportunities on web and mobile experiences. FullStory's best-in-class DXI platform helps brands understand their users' digital experiences to eliminate friction and capitalize on what's successful.

similar_products.short_desc: Iridium provides law firms with Business Intelligence and financial analytics solutions to improve processes and profitability.
similar_products.features: Iridium Technology is a global firm specifically focused on business intelligence, profitability, and financial management for legal and professional services firms. Iridium has more than 300 law firm clients globally, ranging from 40 to 2000+ timekeepers. Iridiums mission is to help firms improve processes and maximize profitability. Iridium lives and breathes business intelligence and financial analytics for law firms every hour of every day. To learn more about Iridium Technology, please v

By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.

_source.short_desc: iAuditor gets everyone on the same paperless page. Move away from the tick and flick of paper to real-time visibility.
_source.long_desc: Safety is now a core component of brand reputation across every industry. Everyone has the right to expect a safe experience so businesses must prioritise the safety of their people and customers, with clear lines of communication that make everyone an active participant. With iAuditor you can share inspection reports with your stakeholders and other teams just by clicking a button. This commitment of adopting a safety culture holds the key to getting the world safely back to business.
_source.pricing_details:
iAuditor is FREE, simply download the app and login using your iAuditor account from the mobile or web app. iAuditor offers several flexible plan types with added features on a per user, per month basis. 


- Premium: $19/user per month, billed annually, and $24/user per month, billed monthly. Looking to upgrade? Check out all the benefits of premium at safetyculture.com/pricing

- Enterprise: Options available, contact us today for a quote at safetyculture.com/contact-us
_source.target_audience: SafetyCulture iAuditor is designed for companies who need to conduct safety inspections & quality audits, to quickly spot and resolve issues, and to improve operational efficiency across their teams.

category_features.name: Appointment Management
category_features.definition: Schedule, change or cancel appointments

category_features.name: Barcode / Ticket Scanning
category_features.definition: The ability to scan barcodes to ensure accurate pricing and label tracking

category_features.name: Code Enforcement
category_features.definition: Ensure all properties are adhering to government and legal codes

category_features.name: Customer Database
category_features.definition: Searchable repository of information about clients

category_features.name: Dispatch Management
category_features.definition: Manage sending personnel and resources to a site as needed

category_features.name: Failed Inspection Tracking
category_features.definition: Track and store information regarding failed inspections

category_features.name: Image Capture
category_features.definition: Process images and automatically scan for data

category_features.name: Report Templates
category_features.definition: Sample of reports that could be customized as needed or used as is

category_features.name: Subcontractor Management
category_features.definition: Track information, qualifications, and contact details of subcontractors

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Asset Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor assets (i.e. equipment, tools, software, hardware, etc.) lifecycle and usage from acquisition to retirement

category_features.name: Audit Planning
category_features.definition: Create a targeted plan, schedule resources, and determine long-term goals for the audit process

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Forms Management
category_features.definition: Organize, store and distribute forms and form templates in a centralized location

category_features.name: Issue Management
category_features.definition: Identify and respond to unexpected problems or failures

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Risk Assessment
category_features.definition: Initiate collection and analysis of key information pertaining to enterprise risk

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create, design, and automate processes within the software

category_features.name: Audit Management
category_features.definition: Plan, schedule and execute organization's accounts and assets to ensure they all comply with policies, laws, and requirements.

category_features.name: Corrective and Preventive Actions (CAPA)
category_features.definition: Investigate and take action at root cause or error in products/processes to prevent recurrence of the same error

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Hazardous Materials Management
category_features.definition: Document use of hazardous materials and procedures related to their handling and disposal

category_features.name: Incident Management
category_features.definition: Identify, resolve and restore unplanned service failures/disruptions or injuries

category_features.name: Industrial Safety Management
category_features.definition: Create, document, and monitor safety policies and procedures in industrial plants and factories

category_features.name: Inspection Management
category_features.definition: Track, manage, control and monitor worksite inspections to remain compliant with industry standards

category_features.name: OSHA Recordkeeping
category_features.definition: Maintain records necessary for compliance with Occupational Health and Safety Administration requirements

category_features.name: Occupational Health Management
category_features.definition: Manage cases of on-the-job injuries and related remedies

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Risk Management
category_features.definition: Identify, evaluate, mitigate, and report on risk

category_features.name: Training Management
category_features.definition: Track employee's progression through training programs

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Drag & Drop
category_features.definition: Click and object and drag and drop through an interface

category_features.name: Forms Creation & Design
category_features.definition: Create and design new forms from scratch using templates and design tools, or scan and convert existing forms into the system

category_features.name: Full Text Search
category_features.definition: Look through entire documents, not just sections

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflow

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

related_products.short_desc: UpKeep is rated the #1 mobile-first Inspection Software to streamline work orders, facility, and asset management.
related_products.features: UpKeep's Inspection Software is rated the #1 mobile-first maintenance and asset management solution for your team. From your desktop to your phone and even your tablet, UpKeep is easily accessible from anywhere at any time. Create work orders on-the-go, get notifications when tasks are updated, and receive alerts straight from your app when assets go down making your business run more efficiently than ever before.

related_products.short_desc: HomeGauge ONE is the ultimate business toolkit for Home Inspectors. Try it for $9.90/mo for 3 months!
related_products.features:
HomeGauge ONE is a one-stop-shop, providing everything you need to manage, market, and grow your home inspection business, under ONE roof. 

No more juggling providers or platforms to manage all your business needs. You'll get:

Web Writer (& iOS mobile app)
Desktop Writer
Scheduler
Dashboards (Buyer, Agent, & Inspector)
Payments & Agreements
Forms & Templates
CRL (create repair list)
Websites, Content, SEO
Homebuyer PLUS Homebuyer benefits
Training & Support

Try us for $9.90/mo for 3 months!

related_products.short_desc: Eliminate paper inspection forms and improve inspection quality, with Whip Around's intuitive and easy to use inspections software.
related_products.features:
Whip Around enables drivers to more effectively and efficiently complete their vehicle inspections so they can get on the road safely, in no time at all.

This inspection data is housed on our digital platform, giving business owners and fleet managers instant access to inspections results and their fleets' vitals. 

Eliminate the need for paper and spreadsheets with customized digital forms, and track fault management - ensuring vehicles stay compliant, and drivers stay safe.

related_products.short_desc: MaintainX is mobile-first inspection digitization software that increases efficiency and real-time insights from the field.
related_products.features:
MaintainX is mobile-first procedure digitization software that allows frontline teams to conduct inspections, safety procedures, checklists and more from the field.

Here's what we digitize and take away from the clipboard:

-Safety Procedures
-Environmental Checklists
-Tooling & Gauge Reporting
-Maintenance Procedures
-Auditing/Inspection Workflows
-Training Checklists

We help managers to become more efficient operators by delivering real-time business insights from the field.

related_products.short_desc: Jolt is a tablet-based software for managing tasks, temperatures, checklists, and forms to help you handle inspections with ease.
related_products.features: Jolt is a tablet-based software for managing tasks, temperatures, checklists, and forms to help you handle inspections with ease. Real-time analytics and text notifications make sure nothing falls through the cracks, and digital checklists and forms ensure perfect records come inspection time. Trusted by over 300,000 hourly workers across the globe, Jolt helps manage inspections in the food, retail, maintenance, and healthcare industries.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 home inspection software for home inspectors. Simplify & automate scheduling, billing, report delivery, bookkeeping and more.
related_products.features: Home inspectors: simplify scheduling, billing, report delivery, bookkeeping and more with the #1 home inspection software from ISN. Automate repetitive tasks, get paid faster, track the status of jobs, keep in touch with clients and agents and integrate with home inspection tools. Not just repurposed software for another industry, ISN home inspection software is built for and by home inspectors. Get set up quickly with free training and world-class support that goes beyond setting up software.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 platform for digital project delivery and controls that connects teams to build the world. Trusted by 5+ million users globally
related_products.features: Owners and delivery teams trust Oracle Aconex for visibility, control, reduced risk, and connected teams. Drive efficiency in design and construction coordination, project controls and cost management, document management, and field management. Get fast time to value with construction management software that is easy to use and deploys in days.

related_products.short_desc: Fulcrum allows anyone to automate field inspection processes in minutes.
related_products.features: Fulcrum is a field inspection management platform that ensures safer, higher quality, and compliant outcomes for mobile teams. With Fulcrum, organizations can digitize data collection and inspection processes in minutes, manage inspection-related issues and tasks in one place, effortlessly demonstrate compliance with regulations, and get consistent actionable insights and reports from teams in the field.

related_products.short_desc: GoCanvas enables any business to replace inefficient paper-based inspections with customizable mobile inspection apps . No IT required!
related_products.features: GoCanvas is a cloud-based software that enables businesses to replace expensive and inefficient paper forms with powerful apps on their smartphones and tablets. GoCanvas enables users to collect information using mobile devices, share that information and easily integrate with existing backend systems. GoCanvas also offers the first business-only application store of its kind, with 20,000+ pre-built, fully customizable apps that work on all mobile platforms and serve 30+ vertical markets.

related_products.short_desc: Revolutionize inspections with enterprise-grade field-focused apps. Collect rich, accurate data and integrate with systems of record.
related_products.features: Does your field team perform regular inspections? ProntoForms' field-focused no-code app solution streamlines operations. Our powerful platform improves your business with real-time access to rich and accurate inspection data. Seamless integration enables instant distribution, in your format of choice, to your back-office or cloud services. Build and deploy custom apps that are easy to manage and easier to navigate. Receive complete and accurate work records from the field on time, each time.

Mobile workflows make it easy to capture the right data, at the right place, at the right time - every time. Teams stay connected with instant communications on mobile, and real-time insights allow leaders to spot and fix issues quickly and measure trends over time so teams can take action on the opportunities that move business forward.

similar_products.features:
Whip Around enables drivers to more effectively and efficiently complete their vehicle inspections so they can get on the road safely, in no time at all.

This inspection data is housed on our digital platform, giving business owners and fleet managers instant access to inspections results and their fleets' vitals.

similar_products.short_desc: IntouchCheck is an inspection software that turns any smart device into a digital clipboard - making updates & data collection easy
similar_products.features:
IntouchCheck is an inspection software that turns any smart device into a digital clipboard and easily rolls out standardized procedures to any location. Conduct audits and collect data instantly from remote teams and drive high-value insights into your daily operations.

Your customers expect and deserve a consistent experience regardless of when or where they visit your business. While you can't be everywhere at once, IntouchCheck can.

similar_products.short_desc: SBN Inspect is used by safety and compliance leaders to streamline inspections and reporting.
similar_products.features: Designed for safety and compliance leaders! SBN Inspect is easy to implement yet powerful inspection software. SBN Inspect features fully customizable forms that allow you to capture data your way. Comprehensive tracking of identified corrective actions helps make sure your business runs smoothly. Advanced reporting in the form of customizable dashboards and push-button reports makes sure you have the data you need. Save Time. Do More. Keep it Simple.

similar_products.short_desc: Operandio is an operations & digital checklist platform that helps business owners and managers raise the standard of their workforce.
similar_products.features:
Operandio is an operations and digital checklist platform that helps business owners and managers achieve staff accountability, safety, compliance and consistent business processes across multiple locations.

Raise the standard of your workforce with Operandio:

- Recurring tasks, checklists and procedures accessible via mobile or shared tablet apps
- Business knowledge and training, searchable and accessible to your entire workforce
- Powerful workforce messaging and communication
- Reporting

similar_products.short_desc: Designed especially for smaller municipalities. Permit and inspections software for Windows.  Ideal for automating your manual system.
similar_products.features:
Designed especially for smaller municipal jurisdictions! Windows based permit and inspections management system. Complete tracking of application, approvals, permit issuance, all inspections and C/O's when needed. Includes code enforcement inspections. Optional modules include contractor licensing, business licenses, rental property and/or landlord, annual fire inspections, elevator inspections and more.
Includes numerous ways to customize the system so it functions the way you do business.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based environmental safety and compliance software to assist companies in optimizing their workflow, reporting, and analytics.
similar_products.features:
Salute's cloud-based safety software enables environmental health & safety teams to manage all data and workflow within one unified system - Assessments, Incidents, HazMat, Inventory, Training and more.

Automate follow-up with built-in task management, improve visibility with out-of-the-box dashboards, and build a data-driven safety culture with analytics.

Whether conducting an onsite inspection, managing a chemical inventory, or downloading an SDS- Salute makes it easy to do from any device.

similar_products.short_desc: Your easy-to-make, easy-to-connect custom mobile inspection and workflow system that is reliable and secure.  Private Label it!
similar_products.features:
Do inspections YOUR way. Our flexible platform makes it easy for you to design simple or complex inspections with calculations. Finished reports will look identical to your current designs, using Word/Excel templates. 

Add photos, annotations, GPS, Signatures, Audio/Video, and more. Enforce business rules and field visibility. Get real-time analytics and scoring using our business logic engine. Automate (RPA) document assembly, distribution, filing and notification included.

similar_products.short_desc: Inspection Software Made Easy. Simple. Flexible. Scalable. Setup in Minutes. Try for 1 Month Free. ISO & FDA Traceability.
similar_products.features: Inspection Automation Software Made Easy. 100% Cloud-Based Platform. Unlimited Scalability. Easily Create a Global Inspection Tool for Multiple Sites. Easy Set-Up. Setup Inspection Forms and Train Employees. Includes End-To-End Traceability. Link Failed Inspection Records to Nonconforming Products or Corrective Actions. One Unified Platform. Automate Business Processes & Boost Quality. Save Time & Money. Increase Profitability. Minimize Recalls. Try for 1 Month Free.

similar_products.short_desc: SmartGov helps your organization simplify planning, permitting, licensing, inspections, code enforcement and more.
similar_products.features: Brightly Software's (formerly Dude Solutions) SmartGov is a configurable cloud-based licensing and permitting solution for local and state jurisdictions that promotes internal efficiency, reduced processing times, and increased confidence from citizen and applicants. Manage permits, business licenses, inspections, code enforcement, planning, and reporting with configurable plan review, permit routing and forms that enhance operational efficiency, reduce labor costs and engages your community on the web or mobile platforms.
